environment.title: Environmentally aware
environment.farm:
Organic ingredients
We attach great importance to sustainability and healthy food. Our products are made entirely from organic ingredients, and the necessary animal husbandry is only carried out in the best possible conditions.
This protects the environment in the long term.
environment.local:
Human distribution
Our products are prepared by hand and, because they are bought locally, are as fresh as possible.
We also sell in cooperation with small organic stores.
This noticeably reduces the impact on the environment.
